titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Ella went to lunch with the American admiral here: I had a less entertaining experience in lunching at the Exposition. Mr Pelly was good enough to walk me round the show. The thing that interested me most was a small collection of wild beasts.
In the evening we dined with the Pellys.
